Interface Weapon

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractWeapon, Cyberblade, Electroscythe, Flamethrower, Furnace, GrenadeLauncher, Heatseeker, Hellion, LockRifle, MachineGun, PlasmaGun, PowerGlove, Railgun, RocketLauncher, Shockwave, Shotgun, Sledgehammer, Thor, TractorBeam, VortexCannon, Whisper, ZX2

    public interface Weapon

    • Method Detail

      • setLoad

        void setLoad(boolean load)
        Setter of the load field.
        Parameters:
        load - the loading state of the weapons.

      • getLoad

        boolean getLoad()
        Getter of the load field.
        Returns:
        true if it can be used, false otherwise.

      • getReloadCost

        Cubes getReloadCost()
        Getter of the reloadCost.
        Returns:
        the Cubes cost of the weapon to reload.

      • getBuyingCost

        Cubes getBuyingCost()
        Getter of the buyingCost.
        Returns:
        the Cubes cost of the weapon to buy.

      • getType

        java.lang.String getType()
        Getter of the type field.
        Returns:
        the name of the weapon.

      • getEffect

        Shot[] getEffect()
        Getter of the effect field.
        Returns:
        the array of the effect the weapon has.

      • getWeaponShots

        java.util.ArrayList<WeaponShot> getWeaponShots()
        Getter of the weaponShots field.
        Returns:
        the list of the weaponShots available.

      • applyEffect

        void applyEffect(WeaponShot weaponShot)
        Apply the effect of the weapon based on the weapon, the effect chosen inside weaponShot parameter.
        Parameters:
        weaponShot - the WeaponShot object used to obtain data and for applying damage and marks.

      • weaponFactory

        Weapon weaponFactory(Weapon weapon)
        Factory method for duplicating weapons, in order to apply the effect.
        Parameters:
        weapon - the weapon to be duplicated.
        Returns:
        the weapon duplicated.
